title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.2 - Records available for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.2 - Records available for public inspection

State Regulations

There shall be maintained, as available for public
inspection, the records and information required to be available for public
inspection by the Freedom of Information Law and such other information or
records as shall be designated by the board as available for public
inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2430.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
